Suggestions: Providing delivery service can definitely help improve rating.
Providing street parking is convenient for customers and can improve customers' satisfaction by 0.22 stars. If it's hard to get available street parking, other types of parking space can also help.
People love fresh air so having outdoor seating can help your business outrace others'. It can help improve rating by 0.15.
The atmosphere in a highly rated coffe shop may not bear a noisy tv. Removing tv can help rebuild the ambience and improve rating by 0.21.
There is no difference in having Wifi or no wifi with respect to ratings
It would be a good choice to provide a classy environment which can influence the rating positively.
